I improved the simple Industrial Furnace with my newest technologies. Now it consumes Neon Energy and received an upgradable computer system.
The Neon Industrial Furnace features some sensors and precisely adjustable heating coils. So it can perfectly control the smelting process.
With these new abilities, I was also able to modify my old recipes to make them more efficient. (all Recipes are listed in the following Researches)
I am sure that there are more uses for this machine. I have also integrated a system for consumption of support points, which I can use in more complex recipes.
Important: The consumption of support points (SP) is not able to be done by using the Flash Memory. The required technique will be researchable later!
